backup_rules.name: Backup Rules
backup_rules.description: Backup firewall and traffic rules to a file

filename.name: Filename
filename.description: Name of the backup file (will be stored in Home Assistant's config directory)

restore_rules.name: Restore Rules
restore_rules.description: Restore firewall and traffic rules from a backup file

filename.name: Filename
filename.description: Name of the backup file to restore from (must exist in Home Assistant's config directory)

rule_ids.name: Rule IDs
rule_ids.description: Optional list of specific rule IDs to restore

name_filter.name: Name Filter
name_filter.description: Optional filter - only restore rules containing this text in their name

rule_types.name: Rule Types
rule_types.description: Optional list of rule types to restore (policy, route, firewall, traffic)

bulk_update_rules.name: Bulk Update Rules
bulk_update_rules.description: Enable or disable multiple rules based on name matching

name_filter.name: Name Filter
name_filter.description: Text to match against rule names

state.name: State
state.description: True to enable matched rules, False to disable them

rule_id.name: Rule ID
rule_id.description: The ID of the rule to delete

rule_type.name: Rule Type
rule_type.description: The type of rule to delete. Currently only supports 'policy' for firewall policies
